content:
You can attach a few files for test decryption by packing them into an archive with zip, rar, tar, 7zip, 7z, tar.gz extensions of no more than 10 megabytes using the attach button directly in the chat.

If your archive weighs more than 10 megabytes, please use our file sharing service.
http://lockbitfss2w7co3ij6am6wox4xcurtgwukunx3yubcoe5cbxiqakxqd.onion
http://lockbitfsvf75glg226he5inkfgtuoakt4vgfhd7nfgghx5kwz5zo3ad.onion
http://lockbitfskq2fxclyfrop5yizyxpzu65w7pphsgthawcyb4gd27x62id.onion
For security reasons we do not click on other links you send in chat.
Please wait for a reply, sometimes it takes several hours due to possible time zone differences.
Hi, can you explain what is happening?
We were affiliates of RansomHub, now RansomHub closed, we movede here. So existing companies (including yours) which we had to deal with still have chance to prevent their data leak.
So are you not RansomHub anymore?

We are the only owners of your data, we - previous affiliates of RansomHub, now LockBit. In any case, this does not concern you. All you need to know that we are the only owners of your data. And our negotiation interrupted payment stage. Final price is 900k as we said.
I'm confused because when we were talking on the other channel, you offered us a substantial discount that doesn't seem to be factored into the price you're asking here.
It was 10% if you pay till the end of that month?
The only discount we can give you is 10% till the 10th of this month, after price will be again 900k.
How do we know you are the only ones with our data?
We are affiliates who pentested your network, so only we have your data. In worst case, in final, you will see that only WE published your data in blog if you refuse to pay.
Your discount works till 10th. Remember that.
We are inclined to believe you but I hope you understand that we want to be sure where our data lies. Could you provide three other files as proof?
Okay. you have partial_list. Ask for 3.
Any news?

2023_08_10_Distributed Energy Resource_outlook_webinar_FINAL.pdf
US Open 2021.xlsx
1251 AOTA - 41st Floor / Floor Plan.pdf
Thanks. We will review these and get back to you.
Okay.
Tomorrow is the last day of discount.
Any news?
Our bank is saying that LockBit is sanctioned. How do you suggest we proceed?
You just buy bitcoin for your own needs and send it to us. There is no need to mention "Lockbit" or any other related stuff.
If these are the people advising others on money, I’d be worried — and right now it just seems like you’re stalling for time. Be quick.
Any news?
That's not how this works. An expense this high has to come from the company and needs to be justified.
Solve this issue, if not soon we are going to start timer on blog under your company title.
You can buy bitcoin as an own investment etc. There are a lot of ways how to solve this.
I will ask another way, can we start uploading your data?
Since you are not giving us ETA, soon we will start timer on blog under your company title.
We aren't trying to waste time, but it is illegal to pay the group for which you now work for. Anyone who sends it personally could go to jail.

Companies pay and get their data deleted. We can give you other btc wallet related to no group. Technically you don't pay LockBit, you pay to independent researchers. It is the last chance how we can help you.
bc1qyxz9fv5q96sdurvxvpmkckgx9mhxr9wd4etxzd
So then, if we are not paying LockBit to delete our data and to not publish our data ... then to where would you post our company title or upload our data?
You are wasting our time. One who wants to pay, solve this issue and not ask these kind of questions.
